Titles.eng: The Garden of Sinners - Remix: Gate of Seventh Heaven
Titles.jpn: 劇場版「空の境界」Remix -Gate of seventh heaven-

Summaries.eng: Extracts the key themes and scenes from first six movies  in chronological order, beginning from the 2nd movie, followed by the 4th, 3rd, 1st, 5th and 6th. A mixture of mostly existing scenes, and some new scenes.

Aliases: Kara no Kyoukai Remix: Gate of Seventh Heaven
